message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product.  Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident we can find a price that works for both of us.
Alice, $20,000 is way above my budget. I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $12,000.  Let's see if we can find common ground.
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down to $18,000. This is a very competitive offer for a product of this caliber.
Alice, I understand your perspective, but $18,000 is still outside my price range. I'm firm on my offer of $12,000.  Let's find a way to make this work, or I'll have to explore other options.
